hadiths.text: Fatima bint Qais (Allah be pleased with her) reported from Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) that there is no lodging and maintenance allowance for a woman who has been given irrevocable divorce

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُطَلَّقَةُ ثَلاَثًا لاَ نَفَقَةَ لَهَا
chapter.eng-name: The woman who has been irrevocably divorced is not entitled to spending
